resources.string: Place device on a level surface and tap Calibrate

Unable to find offset file. Try again
Detect USB-connected PC as USB Wall Charger, for faster charging mode
Charge support in USB host mode.\nAttention: Make sure the connected power source (e.g. USB-Hub) can handle the power draw if charging is enabled to avoid damage.
A2DP Sink is enabled, A2DP Source is disabled
A2DP Sink is disabled, A2DP Source is enabled
Bluetooth must be deactivated before changing A2DP mode.
High-End graphic effects are enabled, features like transparent lock screen, status and notification bars are enabled
High-End graphic effects are disabled, features like transparent lock screen, status and notification bars are disabled
Impossible to set High-End GFX setting, please grant the root permissions for this app.
Low RAM is enabled, large-RAM features are disabled
Low RAM is disabled, large-RAM features are enabled
Impossible to set LowRam setting, please grant the root permissions for this app.

Impossible to set max background services, please grant the root permissions for this app.

To apply the setting, a reboot is required.
Would you like to reboot now?

Press Yes to reboot now, No if you prefer to reboot later.
The device will be rebooted in %1$d seconds, please wait.
Adjust the delay before the touch key backlight automatically turns off
